name: AI Games Jam
description:
Game Jam project for University. 

You're in a room overlooking another with a dog and a couple of puzzles. 

Command the dog and get it to do the puzzles to finish the game. 

(Currently has no finish state)

---------------------------------------------------------------

Meet the Team!

Aster Reeves: Concept Art, Widgets 

Shangxuan Liu: Concept Art, In-Game Cameras/ Screens

Charlotte Roiz De Sa: Assets

William "Louis"  Nicholls: Puzzle Coding and Development

Ryan Drewry: AI Coding and Development

---------------------------------------------------------------

Controls - 

Use Left mouse to call dog to player location. 

E to make the dog stay put.

Use Right mouse to send it to the location of the waypoint. 

WASD to move.
